desc.en: Ako calls Sensei to discuss her suspicions about Schale. Sensei is caught off guard. Ako continues to passionately insist that there are plenty of other sinister forces targeting the Prefect Team but soon comes to her senses before leaving in a hurry.
desc.jp: Ako calls Sensei to discuss her suspicions about Schale. Sensei is caught off guard. Ako continues to passionately insist that there are plenty of other sinister forces targeting the Prefect Team but soon comes to her senses before leaving in a hurry.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}约老师见面，想一起讨论{et夏莱}的可疑之处。老师身为{et夏莱}的一分子虽然感到有些不知所措，但{cf亚子}却兴奋地告诉老师除了{et夏莱}以外，奇普托斯之中还有许多对{cn风纪委员会}虎视眈眈的危险势力。之后{cf亚子}恢复了理智，急忙逃离了现场。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Aris plays a dating simulator for the first time, but is struggling to choose between the Bearded King and the Bald Emperor. Following Sensei's advice, she takes a different approach.
desc.jp: Aris plays a dating simulator for the first time, but is struggling to choose between the Bearded King and the Bald Emperor. Following Sensei's advice, she takes a different approach.
desc.zh_cn: 体验了没接触过的恋爱仿真游戏的{cf爱丽丝}。{cf爱丽丝}烦恼在山羊胡陛下和秃头皇帝之中该选择谁，她将依照老师的建议找出新攻略。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

name.en: Aris Quest: To Become a Legend
name.jp: Aris Quest: To Become a Legend

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Asuna asks about the meaning behind the bunny girl outfit at the cafe. Afterward, Asuna, satisfied by Sensei's answer, shares some coffee with Sensei.
desc.jp: Asuna asks about the meaning behind the bunny girl outfit at the cafe. Afterward, Asuna, satisfied by Sensei's answer, shares some coffee with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 偶然在咖啡厅里碰见老师后，{cf明日奈}向老师问起了兔女郎装的意义。因为得到满意的回答，{cf明日奈}便邀老师一起喝咖啡。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
